About Me

BIO

I'm a Graphic Design student at the Metropolitan University of Belgrade with more than 6 years of experience with Photoshop and Illustrator. Efficient, quick and a perfectionist, I've been drawing digital art for games almost all my life and enjoy designing anything media-related, be it movie posters, ad campaigns, concept art, illustration, UI, etc.

I can deliver original, professional-quality photography for designs, or illustrate something completely new both digitally or traditionally.
In some scenarios, 3D modeling might be needed for a design or illustration project, in which case I can use Blender software to deliver quality renders quickly.

All of my designs, drawings or models are done on a powerful rig, ensuring nothing but top quality and quick completion.
